revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = SonicWALL SonicPoint-N Series.jpeg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Secure Dual Radio Wireless Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.sonicguard.com/SonicPoint-N-Series.asp |sp = https://www.sonicwall.com/support/knowledge-base/sonicpoint-n-ni-ne-ndr-overview-features-and-specifications/170503348982115/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = SonicWALL_SonicPoint-N_DR |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SonicWALL |model = SonicPoint |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -N |revision = DR |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = APL23-081 |wlclass = AN900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = enterprise access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = QWU-081 |icid = 4408A-081 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN5010; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 300 / 400 / 500 / 600 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;M29W128GH-70N6; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS1G63EFR-Y5C; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:17:C5 |oui = 00:17:C5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.66 |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = two-pronged
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ-45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = external antennas, fan, heatsink |addchip = Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;,,, GaAs IRED & Photo-transistor;Toshiba;TLP781;;1;,,, 150V 4.1A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS2582;;1;,,, 32-Kbit serial I²C bus EEPROM;STMicro;M24C32-W;;2;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-AND Gate;TI;SN74LV08A;;1;,,, Low Cost Oscillator PLL Clock Multiplier;Renesas;ICS512;;2;,,, Spread Spectrum Clock Generator;Cypress Semi;CY25568;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;Nexperia;74LVCH244APW;;2;,,, 256Kbit I²C-Compatible Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C256C;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3232C;;1;,,, 80V 8.9A N-Channel PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS3572;;1;,,, Dual Notebook Power Supply 30V N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild;FDS6982AS;;2;,,, 802.3at PD w/Synchronous No-Opto Flyback Controller;Linear Technology;LTC4269-1;;1;,,, Dual 2-Phase Synchronous Step-Down Switching Controller;Linear Technology;LTC3850;;1;,,, 1.5A/1A 4MHz Dual Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Regulator;Linear Technology;LTC3417A-2;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL<!-- (01/01/2020) --> |fccapprovdate = 03/03/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9160; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9106; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9160; |rad2chip2 = Atheros;AR9103; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN5010 [[MIPS64]] (@500MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 16MB NOR Flash *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9132/AR9106 (3T3R 802.11abgn), :[[Atheros]] AR9132/AR9103 (3T3R 802.11bgn) *Power: 12V, 1.66A via two-prong connector or 802.3at
==Links of Interest== ===Models=== :[https://sonicwall.rightanswers.com/portal/app/portlets/results/onsitehypermedia/090170801553932.png?linkToken=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzb25pY3dhbGwiLCJleHAiOjE2NDM2OTkxMjgsImlhdCI6MTYxMjE2MzEyOH0.S-Yp_B3qvf904SOlTSMK9Pg_jscNUdq29RNf8ZDuaFw Specifications] • [https://www.cnet.com/products/dell-sonicwall-sonicpoint-ne-dual-band-wireless-access-point-series/ C|Net]
*SonicPoint-N (Dual Band) *SonicPoint-Ni (Internal Antennas) *SonicPoint-Ne (External Antennas) *SonicPoint-N-DR (Dual Radio)
